00033 SetupNavigator::SetupNavigator() {
00034 
00035   fSQLiteFilename="sqlite://pedestals-and-noises.sqlite";
00036   fServer = new TSQLiteServer(fSQLiteFilename.c_str());
00037 
00038   if (fServer->IsZombie()) {
00039     std::cout << "SetupNavigator: ERROR: Couldn't connect to SQLite database." << std::endl;
00040     throw Except::NoCalibDB();
00041   }
00042 }

00044 SetupNavigator::~SetupNavigator() {
00045 
00046   fServer->Close();
00047 
00048   if (fThis) 
00049     delete fThis;
00050 }

00052 std::string SetupNavigator::GetBank(const IDs::channel& src)const{
00053     TSetupData* setup=TSetupData::Instance();
00054     std::map<std::string, std::string>* bankDetNameMap=&setup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00055     for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator it = bankDetNameMap->begin();
00056             it != bankDetNameMap->end(); ++it){
00057         if(modules::parser::iequals(it->second , src.str())) return it->first;
00058     }
00059     std::cout << "Invalid detector name: " << src.str() << std::endl;
00060     throw Except::InvalidDetector();
00061 }
00062 
00063 void SetupNavigator::CacheCalibDB() {
00064   // Cache all the variables we have in the database
00065   // First the pedestals and noises
00066   fTableName = "pedestals_and_noises";
00067   if (!fServer->HasTable(fTableName.c_str())) {// check it exists
00068     std::cout << "SetupNavigator: ERROR: Table " << fTableName << " does not exist." << std::endl;
00069     if (!fCommandLineArgs.calib)
00070       throw Except::NoCalibDB();
00071   } else {
00072     ReadPedestalAndNoiseValues();
00073   }
00074   if (!fServer->HasTable("CoarseTimeOffset")) {
00075     std::cout << "SetupNavigator: ERROR: Table " << "CoarseTimeOffset" << " does not exist." << std::endl;
00076     if (!fCommandLineArgs.calib)
00077       throw Except::NoCalibDB();
00078   } else {
00079     ReadCoarseTimeOffsetValues();
00080   }
00081 }
00082 
00083 void SetupNavigator::ReadPedestalAndNoiseValues() {
00084   // The values that we will read in
00085   double pedestal=definitions::DefaultValue;
00086   double noise=definitions::DefaultValue;
00087   std::string channelname;
00088  
00089   std::stringstream query;
00090   int run_number = GetRunNumber(); // get this run number (Note that if we don't have a catalogue of pedestals and noises for each run then we will want to change this)
00091 
00092   query << "SELECT * FROM " << fTableName << " WHERE run=" << run_number << ";"; // get all the pedestals and noises
00093   TSQLiteResult* result = (TSQLiteResult*) fServer->Query(query.str().c_str());  // get the result of this query
00094   query.str(""); // clear the stringstream after use
00095   
00096   TSQLiteRow* row = (TSQLiteRow*) result->Next(); // get the first row
00097   while (row != NULL) {
00098     channelname = row->GetField(1);
00099     pedestal = atof(row->GetField(3));
00100     noise = atof(row->GetField(4));
00101     
00102     fPedestalValues[channelname] = pedestal;
00103     fNoiseValues[channelname] = noise;
00104     delete row;
00105     row = (TSQLiteRow*) result->Next(); // get the next row
00106   }
00107   delete result; // user has to delete the result
00108 
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 void SetupNavigator::ReadCoarseTimeOffsetValues() {
00113   // The values that we will read in
00114   const std::vector<std::string> table = GetCoarseTimeOffsetColumns();
00115 
00116   std::stringstream query;
00117   query << "SELECT channel";
00118   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < table.size(); ++i)
00119     query << ",\"" << table[i] << '"';
00120   query << " FROM " << "CoarseTimeOffset" << " WHERE run==" << GetRunNumber();
00121   TSQLResult* res = fServer->Query(query.str().c_str());
00122 
00123   TSQLRow* row;
00124   while ((row = res->Next())) {
00125     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < table.size(); ++i) {
00126       std::stringstream srcstr;
00127       srcstr << row->GetField(0) << IDs::field_separator << table[i];
00128       fCoarseTimeOffset[IDs::source(srcstr.str())] = atof(row->GetField(1 + i));
00129     }
00130     delete row;
00131   }
00132   delete res;
00133 }
00134 
00135 std::vector<std::string> SetupNavigator::GetCoarseTimeOffsetColumns() {
00136   std::vector<std::string> cols;
00137   std::stringstream cmd;
00138   cmd << "PRAGMA table_info(" << "CoarseTimeOffset" << ")";
00139   TSQLResult* res = fServer->Query(cmd.str().c_str());
00140   TSQLRow* row;
00141   while ((row = res->Next())) {
00142     if (row->GetField(1) != std::string("run") && row->GetField(1) != std::string("channel"))
00143       cols.push_back(std::string(row->GetField(1)));
00144     delete row;
00145   }
00146   delete res;
00147   return cols;
00148 }
00149 
00150 void SetupNavigator::SetCoarseTimeOffset(const IDs::source& src, const double dt) {
00151   std::stringstream cmd;
00152   fServer->StartTransaction();
00153   // Create table and columns if they don't exist
00154   cmd << "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " << "CoarseTimeOffset"
00155       << "(run INT, channel TEXT)";
00156   fServer->Exec(cmd.str().c_str());
00157   CreateColumnIfNotExist("CoarseTimeOffset", src.Generator().str(), "REAL");
00158 
00159   cmd.str("");
00160   cmd << "SELECT * FROM " << "CoarseTimeOffset" << " WHERE run=="
00161       << GetRunNumber() << " AND channel=='" << src.Channel().str() << "'";
00162   TSQLResult* res = fServer->Query(cmd.str().c_str());
00163 
00164   cmd.str("");
00165   if (res->Next())
00166     cmd << "UPDATE " << "CoarseTimeOffset" << " SET \"" << src.Generator().str()
00167         << "\"=" << dt << " WHERE run==" << GetRunNumber() << " AND channel=='"
00168         << src.Channel().str() << "'";
00169   else
00170     cmd << "INSERT INTO " << "CoarseTimeOffset" << "(run,channel,\""
00171         << src.Generator().str() << "\") VALUES (" << GetRunNumber() << ",'"
00172         << src.Channel().str() << "'," << dt << ")";
00173   std::cout << "Executing SQL command: " << cmd.str() << std::endl;
00174   fServer->Exec(cmd.str().c_str());
00175   fServer->Commit();
00176 
00177   delete res;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void SetupNavigator::CreateColumnIfNotExist(const std::string& tab, const std::string& col, const std::string& type) {
00181   std::stringstream cmd;
00182   cmd << "PRAGMA table_info(" << tab << ")";
00183   TSQLResult* res = fServer->Query(cmd.str().c_str());
00184   TSQLRow* row;
00185   while ((row = res->Next())) {
00186     if (col == row->GetField(1)) {
00187       delete row;
00188       delete res;
00189       return;
00190     }
00191     delete row;
00192   }
00193   delete res;
00194 
00195   cmd.str("");
00196   // Since the table name is the source string, which inclueds the character #,
00197   // the table name in the SQLite database must be surrounded by double quotes.
00198   cmd << "ALTER TABLE " << tab << " ADD COLUMN \"" << col << "\" " << type;
00199   fServer->Exec(cmd.str().c_str());
00200 }
